nodes.text: Wild Leader was the callsign given to the leader of Wild Squadron. During the Galactic Civil War, Denish Wraive was designated this callsign during the Hunt for Shadow Wing, and participated in a battle with the 204th Imperial Fighter Wing over the planet Chadawa. Wraive was later killed at the Battle of Jakku.
Wild Leader was first mentioned in the 2021 novel Victory's Price, written by Alexander Freed.
